Package com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.service

Class BorrowingService

java.lang.Object
com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.service.BorrowingService
@Service public class BorrowingService extends Object
Service class for managing Borrowing entities. Handles business logic related to borrowing books in the library system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    BorrowingService(BorrowingRepository borrowingRepository, BookRepository bookRepository, UserRepository userRepository)
    Constructs a new BorrowingService instance with the specified repositories.

  • Constructor Details

    • BorrowingService

      @Autowired public BorrowingService(BorrowingRepository borrowingRepository, BookRepository bookRepository, UserRepository userRepository)
      Constructs a new BorrowingService instance with the specified repositories. This constructor uses Spring's dependency injection to provide access to the data access objects required for managing borrowings, books, and users in the library management system.
      Parameters:
      borrowingRepository - the repository for managing Borrowing entities, must not be null
      bookRepository - the repository for managing Book entities, must not be null
      userRepository - the repository for managing User entities, must not be null

  • Method Details

    • isBookAvailable

      public boolean isBookAvailable(Long bookId)
      Checks if a book is available for borrowing.
      Parameters:
      bookId - the ID of the book to check
      Returns:
      true if the book is available, false otherwise

    • borrowBook

      public BorrowingDTO borrowBook(Long bookId, Long userId)
      Creates a new borrowing record for a specified book and user.
      Parameters:
      bookId - the ID of the book to be borrowed
      userId - the ID of the user borrowing the book
      Returns:
      the created BorrowingDTO entity
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the book or user with the given ID does not exist

    • returnBook

      public BorrowingDTO returnBook(Long borrowingId)
      Marks a borrowed book as returned by setting its return date.
      Parameters:
      borrowingId - the ID of the borrowing record to update
      Returns:
      the updated BorrowingDTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the borrowing ID is invalid or the book is already returned

    • getAllBorrowings

      public List<BorrowingDTO> getAllBorrowings()
      Retrieves a list of all borrowings in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of BorrowingDTO objects

    • getBorrowingById

      public BorrowingDTO getBorrowingById(Long id)
      Retrieves a borrowing record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the borrowing record to retrieve
      Returns:
      the BorrowingDTO containing borrowing details
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the borrowing with the specified ID is not found
